events.name: debug__monsters__CheckSpawnState_LastData
events.comment: Decrypted content of the AJAX request "CheckSpawnState". FOR DEBUGGING. TO DELETE IN FINAL BUILD

events.name: debug__monsters__RequestCreate_LastData
events.comment: Decrypted content of the AJAX request "RequestCreate"'s return data, which indicates to the client how it should proceed. FOR DEBUGGING. TO DELETE IN FINAL BUILD

events.name: monsters__TimerSave_e
events.comment: Encrypted string containing information about the monsters' respawn timer. Updated from the server during Server-Map-RefreshTimer function.

events.name: debug__monsters__TimerSave
events.comment: Decrypted content of TimerSave_e. FOR DEBUGGING. TO DELETE IN FINAL BUILD

events.name: monsters__TimerUIValue
events.comment: Value to display as the monsters' respawn timer in the UI. Concretely, it is a decrypted integer of the TimerSave_e monsters global (just above).

events.name: monsters__GroupsPositionsComposite_e
events.comment: Encrypted string composite of tokens that takes the form |grouphashid@x@y@| for each MonsterLeader on the current map. X and Y coordinates are 'GridGraph' coordinates.

events.name: debug__monsters__GroupsPositionsComposite
events.comment: Decrypted content of GroupPositionsComposite_e. FOR DEBUGGING. TO DELETE IN FINAL BUILD

events.name: monsters__TimerIsOn
events.comment: True (1) when the monsters' respawn timer is activated. This is False (0) when there is already the maximum amount of monsters on a map.

events.title: monsters_ HostControl
events.description: The Photon Host handles a lot of the monsters behaviors and relays information through encrypted tokens to the other peers.

children.text: UPDATE
Record the position of the MonsterLeaders every 2 second. Create a GroupCompositionsComposite encrypted string and send it to the database.
If there is no MonsterLeader, fake a GroupPositionsComposite.

children.name: temp_monster_groups_positions_composite
children.comment: Temporary string to iterate into the GroupPositionsComposite monsters global.

children.text: Construct the GroupPositionsComposite from the values of each MonsterLeader on the current map.

actions.text: Debug value to make sure the iteration went as expected. FOR DEBUGGING. TO DISABLE/DELETE IN FINAL BUILD.

children.text: FUNCTIONS

children.functionDescription: Requests the SpawnState corresponding to the current map's hash ID. Depending on the SpawnState, also returns all the necessary information to initialize the maps' already spawned monsters.

actions.text: APPID and BK as usual (BK only for logging the user sessionkey)

children.functionDescription: Request to refresh the database timer and update the client with the new timer.

actions.text: APPID and BK as usual (BK only for logging the user sessionkey)

children.functionDescription: Send an encrypted information about the position of each monsters group to the database.

actions.text: APPID and BK as usual (BK only for logging the user sessionkey)

children.text: AJAX RESOLUTIONS

actions.text: FIX NEED: Currently sets to max timer / not current timer
Debug value to peek at the LastData easily. FOR DEBUGGING. TO DELETE IN FINAL BUILD.

children.name: temp_spawn_state
children.comment: Temporary decrypted value for the returned SpawnState. Either 0 (max monsters), 1 (no monsters), 2 (existing monsters to spawn). For lisibility.

children.text: Check the returned SpawnState saved in the temporary variable to determine if the local respawn timer should be turned on or off. Additionally, also determines if monsters should be spawned automatically (if they were previously spawned by another player).
SpawnState '0' -> Max monsters.
SpawnState '1' or '2' -> Room to spawn monsters.

children.name: monsters_tokens_to_next_group
children.comment: Temporary value incremented for each iteration of the "i_Monsters" loop down bellow. This integer is then used to select the proper token for subsequent monster groups that need to be spawned.

children.name: temp_monster_groups_count
children.comment: Temporary decrypted value for the returned count of monsters group to spawn. For lisibility.

children.text: SpawnState NOT '1' -> Need to create monsters on map load.

children.name: temp_monster_group_data_composite
children.comment: Temporary decrypted value of the whole data composite associated with the monster group to spawn next. For lisibility.

children.name: temp_monster_group_size
children.comment: Temporary decrypted value of the size of the monster group to be spawned. For lisibility.

children.name: temp_monster_group_hashid
children.comment: Temporary decrypted value of the monster group hash ID associated with the monster(s) to spawn next. For lisibility.

children.name: monsters_group_spawn_x
children.comment: Temporary decrypted value of the size of the X-coordinate over the 'GridGraph' for the monster group to be spawned. For lisibility.

children.name: monsters_group_spawn_y
children.comment: Temporary decrypted value of the size of the Y-coordinate over the 'GridGraph' for the monster group to be spawned. For lisibility.

children.text: Double-check that there are groups to spawn.
Loops through for each monster group to spawn.

children.name: temp_monster_data_composite
children.comment: Temporary decrypted value of the whole data composite associated with the monster to spawn next. Different from the monster_group_data_composite set before. For lisibility.

children.name: temp_monster_hashid
children.comment: Temporary decrypted value of the monster hash ID associated with the monster to spawn next. For lisibility.

children.name: temp_monster_animator_core
children.comment: Temporary decrypted value of the 'AnimatorCore' associated with the monster to spawn next. For lisibility.

children.name: temp_monster_current_health
children.comment: Temporary decrypted value of current health of the monster to be spawned. Used to calculate the initial HealthRatio. For lisibility.

children.name: temp_monster_max_health
children.comment: Temporary decrypted value of maximum health of the monster to be spawned. Used to calculate the initial HealthRatio. For lisibility.

children.name: temp_monster_leader_status
children.comment: Temporary decrypted integer representing whether the next spawn is a MonsterLeader or a MonsterFollower (either 0 or 1).

children.text: In each monster group, loop for the size of the group and spawn the appropriate monsters.
Check if spawning data is for Follower or Leader.

actions.text: Increment and point ot the correct token next on the next "i_MonsterGroup" loop.

children.text: Bind Followers and Leaders of the same group hashID.

actions.text: Relay the Timer to the other peers.

children.text: If the encrypted TimerSave record a timer of zero (0) send a server request to create a monster group from one of the MobSpawners.

children.title: monsters_ Spawning
children.description: The Photon Host handles the validation of the "RequestCreate" request to the server.

children.text: On regular peer joins:

children.name: temp_encrypted_data_composite
children.comment: Temporary holder to prepare the data for the Photon Raised Event.

children.text: FUNCTIONS

children.functionDescription: Checks with the server if a new monster group can be spawned.

functionParameters.name: pX
functionParameters.comment: Encrypted X-coordinate to spawn the monster at.

functionParameters.name: pY
functionParameters.comment: Encrypted Y-coordinate to spawn the monster at.

children.text: AJAX RESOLUTIONS
Checks if the server has signaled that the monster limit is reached. ("MAX" token.)

children.name: temp_monster_group_hashid
children.comment: Temporary decrypted value of the monster group hash ID associated with the monster(s) to spawn next. For lisibility.

children.name: temp_monster_follower_count
children.comment: Temporary decrypted value for the amount of followers to spawn with the MonsterLeader. For lisibility.

children.name: monsters_group_spawn_x
children.comment: Temporary decrypted value of the size of the X-coordinate over the 'GridGraph' for the monster group to be spawned. For lisibility.

children.name: monsters_group_spawn_y
children.comment: Temporary decrypted value of the size of the Y-coordinate over the 'GridGraph' for the monster group to be spawned. For lisibility.

children.name: temp_monster_data_composite
children.comment: Temporary decrypted value of the whole data composite associated with the monster to spawn next. Different from the monster_group_data_composite set before. For lisibility.

children.name: temp_monster_hashid
children.comment: Temporary decrypted value of the monster hash ID associated with the monster to spawn next. For lisibility.

children.name: temp_monster_animator_core
children.comment: Temporary decrypted value of the 'AnimatorCore' associated with the monster to spawn next. For lisibility.

children.name: temp_monster_current_health
children.comment: Temporary decrypted value of current health of the monster to be spawned. Used to calculate the initial HealthRatio. For lisibility.

children.name: temp_monster_max_health
children.comment: Temporary decrypted value of maximum health of the monster to be spawned. Used to calculate the initial HealthRatio. For lisibility.

children.name: temp_monster_leader_status
children.comment: Temporary decrypted integer representing whether the next spawn is a MonsterLeader or a MonsterFollower (either 0 or 1).

children.text: Verifies that there is at least one MonsterFollower to create.
Distinguished between spawning a MonsterLeader and MonsterFollowers here.
Bind Followers and Leaders of the same group hashID.

functionParameters.name: pMonsterGroupHashID
functionParameters.comment: Hash ID to associate with the created monster group.

functionParameters.name: pAnimatorCore
functionParameters.comment: Animator core to set the MonsterLeader to.

children.name: temp_encrypted_data_composite
children.comment: Temporary holder to prepare the data for the Photon Raised Event.
